text: Striariidae is a family of millipedes in the order Chordeumatida. There are at least 3 genera and about 13 described species in Striariidae. ==Genera== * Speostriaria Causey, 1960 * Striaria Bollman, 1888 * Vaferia Causey, 1958 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Chordeumatida Category:Millipede families
title: Striariidae
